text: The 1921 Santa Clara Missionites football team was an American football team that represented Santa Clara University during the 1921 college football season. The team compiled a 6–0 record, shut out five of six opponents, and outscored all opponents by a total of 224 to 9. On September 1, 1921, Santa Clara hired Harry G. Buckingham as its football coach. He played football as a tackle at Princeton and later coached at Colorado School of Mines and Memphis University. He remained as Santa Clara's football coach for two years. ==Schedule== ==References== Santa Clara Category:Santa Clara Broncos football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Santa Clara Missionites football
title: 1921 Santa Clara Missionites football team
